page.title: 14FARMING IN DAVIOT TODAY.CTD.
page.content:
{FORESTRY-}There are several different forestry companies harvesting trees in and around Daviot. FISH FARMING-One farm in the area has begun this type of farming. At the moment the ponds are stocked with rainbow trout but there is a possibility they may stock with salmon.
{CROFTING.}There are still a few crofts that farm in the old ways but many of the crofts are no longer run as crofts and some of the land has been added to neighbouring farms, used as a caravan park or grazing for horses. The{moorland,}and there is a lot of it, is covered in{heather}and may graze sheep.
